Item ID845

An Oak longbow is a longbow made from oak. It can be made at level 25 Fletching by using a knife on oak logs to cut them into an oak longbow (u), granting 25 experience, and then using a bowstring on the unstrung bow, granting another 25 experience. It requires level 5 Ranged to wield and can fire arrows up to and including steel.

It has identical stats to the oak shortbow, but fires at a slower speed.

During the quest Ghosts Ahoy a player might acquire a signed oak bow which is exactly the same as the oak longbow, aside from its name.

Fletching an oak longbow from oak logs and a bow string will profit −110 while fletching an oak longbow from an oak longbow (u) and a bow string will profit −60.

[[File:Oak longbow detail.png|left|120px]]
An '''Oak longbow''' is a [[longbow (weapon)|longbow]] made from oak. It can be made at level 25 [[Fletching]] by using a [[knife]] on [[oak logs]] to cut them into an [[oak longbow (u)]], granting 25 experience, and then using a [[bowstring]] on the unstrung bow, granting another 25 experience. It requires level 5 [[Ranged]] to wield and can fire arrows up to and including [[steel arrow|steel]].

It has identical stats to the [[oak shortbow]], but fires at a slower [[attack speed|speed]].

During the quest [[Ghosts Ahoy]] a player might acquire a [[signed oak bow]] which is exactly the same as the oak longbow, aside from its name.

Fletching an oak longbow from [[oak logs]] and a [[bow string]] will profit {{Coins|{{GEP|Oak longbow}}-({{GEP|Oak logs}}+{{GEP|Bow string}})}} while fletching an oak longbow from an [[oak longbow (u)]] and a [[bow string]] will profit {{Coins|{{GEP|Oak longbow}}-({{GEP|Oak longbow (u)}}+{{GEP|Bow string}})}}.
